Description:
Dream Block Ready for Your Dream Home in the Prestigious 13th Beach Estate
Located in the famous 13th Beach Golf Links Resort home to the Vic Open, this gated community offers privacy and integrity in peaceful and stunning natural surrounds. Build your new home nestled amongst high quality existing homes in the estates most sought after location. Backing onto the first tee of the Beach course the generous 705m2 (approx) is the perfect parcel of land to build your dream home This location is a gateway to the Bellarine Peninsula, Barwon Heads village and your choice of pristine turquoise beaches. Take advantage of the lifestyle this location and community has to offer; enjoy weekend trips to local wineries, gorge yourself on sumptuous local cuisine, or bike down the Bellarine Rail Trail. With Geelong and Melbourne within easy driving distance you can really have it all! Make the change and never look back. This block also comes with two golf share memberships.
Insights: 46 Fourth Loop, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Style, privacy & fairway frontage.
Based in this desirable golf precinct with fairway frontage, beach access and close proximity to the Barwon Heads community hub, this stylish, quality-built home at 13th Beach Golf Links offers a leisure-based, gated lifestyle ideal for downsizers or the holiday escaper. You'll be sold on the views, privacy and space that this fabulous coastal property offers. Three bedroom floor plan flows seamlessly across one level, with an impressive open plan living hub that embraces extensive ceiling heights, gas log fireplace and the perfect position to enjoy your morning cuppa and breakfast whilst you enrich yourself in the morning sun as it rises.
The master bedroom is completed with its own ensuite and built in robes, while the remaining bedrooms are fulfilled with built in robes and are serviced by the central two-way bathroom, as the adjacent bedroom has direct access. Sizable 625sqm (approx.) allotment with a private, north-westerly under cover entertaining area, perfect for enjoying a BBQ with family and friends will be ideal all year round.
Key features include networked internet and Foxtel, double glazing throughout, air conditioning split system, plumbed fridge, golf cart parking space, heated spa, glorified man cave or home gym, low maintenance faux wood alfresco, outdoor shower, external access into the shared bathroom from the front lawn, and the ability to securely park up to 4 cars off the street.
This property is impeccable and is sure to appeal to an array of buyers looking to enter this renowned estate.
Insights: 1/11 Plantation Drive, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2020 and 4 other 3 bedroom house in Connewarre have recently been sold.

Description:
Luxury, Location, Lifestyle
Realise your dream and live a luxurious and relaxing coastal lifestyle with this stunning architecturally designed residence. Perfect for those looking to downsize, this single level 3 bedroom home offers warmth and style in equal measures with its flowing layout and stylish interiors. The property offers a selection of living areas leading to superb outdoor spaces looking out onto the highly acclaimed Creek golf course. Immaculately presented, the generous floor plan comprises 3 spacious bedrooms, the master complemented by separate walk in robes and ensuite featuring oversized shower, double basins, under floor heating and heated towel rack. A long hallway with striking pendant lighting leads to the stunning open plan kitchen/living/dining featuring a huge Caesar stone kitchen bench, quality European appliances and very generous walk in pantry. The spacious living area opens out onto a delightful alfresco deck, complete with remote controlled awning, perfect for entertaining family and friends. The theatre room will provide hours of enjoyment or there is the option of utilising it as a second living area or fourth bedroom. There are hidden extras throughout including zoned ducted heating and air conditioning, white plantation shutters, DLUG and wonderful storage options in the spacious laundry. With attractive coastal gardens and reserve adjacent, this beautiful coastal home provides the ultimate in relaxed living.
Insights: 67 Cashmore Drive, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2020 and 4 other 3 bedroom house in Connewarre have recently been sold.

Description:
Treat Yourself To An Envious Lifestyle
The Feel:
Set in the glorious surrounds of the world-renowned 13th Beach Golf Course estate, this immaculate two-story 2BR townhouse is without doubt offering the best of the best! A short stroll away from the 13th beach Golf Clubhouse with Café and vibrant Restaurant and with a private walking track to the world class surf beach, the lifestyle is indeed enviable. The cosmopolitan township of Barwon Heads is easily accessible within 2kms, yet you’re quietly tucked away to retreat in the busier months. A fantastic entry point, investment property or holiday spoil - inspection will impress.
The Facts:
-OP kitchen, dining and living, enveloped in natural light
-Brand new custom design kitchen with high end appliances and soft closing drawers
-Huge north-facing entertainers deck overlooking The Creek Course
-Private patio off downstairs master suite for total relaxation
-Front coffee deck overlooking the 1st hole of The Beach Course
-Large master suite separately placed, with ensuite and BIRs
-Second BR boasts direct bathroom access for convenience
-R/C Aircon in both BRs and living area
-Internal entry from oversized SLUG with rear roller door access plus more
-Additional off street guest parking are absolute assets
-Fullsize working laundry and recently upgraded HWS
-Freshly painted with new premium carpet and underlay
-New tiled entry, double roller blinds and plantation shutters
-All windows double glazed, pet door on the upper level
-Handy under stair storage and garage storage nook
-Crimsafe security door and electronic remote lock to front entry
-Tennis court usage available to owners and tenants, golf at your doorstep
-Close to fine restaurants, wineries and local produce on The Bellarine
-Situated in a secure gated community for stress-free and peace of mind
-Absolutely nothing left to do but play golf and enjoy the coastal lifestyle
The Owner Loves….
“We’ve loved the tranquillity and close proximity to the surf. We ride our bikes and hit the sand within a few minutes. The quietness of this location truly is a breath of fresh air but it still remains so convenient to the Barwon Heads township. We are really going to miss it”

Description:
Golf, Beach, Relax - Repeat!
Located in the highly sought after and peaceful 13th Beach Estate, home to the Victorian Open, this 2BR apartment will appeal to those looking for a fuss free coastal lifestyle, with beachside benefits. A fantastic opportunity for buyers looking to downsize, invest or treat themselves to a holiday home.
Only a short drive from the centre of town, 20 minutes to Geelong, walk to two award winning golf courses and stunning beaches. One thing to do! and that is snap it up before someone else does.
Property features :
Open plan kitchen, dining and living, bathed in natural light and stunning outlook
Kitchen with modern appliances
Polished concrete floors
Direct access to private patio for alfresco entertaining
A short distance to the 13th Beach Golf Clubhouse
Club facilities available for tenants and owners use
Beautiful course outlooks providing a natural backdrop
Peaceful location with an abundance of native birdlife
2 spacious bedrooms
R/C air conditioning
Euro Laundry
Single lockup garage
Track access onto 13th Beach for surf and summer swims
Low maintenance properties for holiday investors
Insights: 3 other 2 bedroom unit in Connewarre have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious Family Living With 1st Green Views
The Feel:
Located in the renowned 13th Beach Golf Links Estate, home to the Vic Open, this 4 bedroom, dual living home on a generous 705sqm (approx) allotment is positioned in one of the most sought-after no-throughway streets in the Estate. Backing onto the first tee of the Beach Course, the open plan kitchen, meals & living appreciates beautiful views, whilst also maximising the north aspect to communal zones.
The Facts:
-Open plan living and entertaining backs onto the first fairway of the Beach Course
-Family minded floorplan cleverly designed to maximise space while providing 2 living zones
-Indoor/outdoor lifestyle, with sliding doors opening to outdoor courtyards, lawn & spa
-Highly functional interior, with a large, modern kitchen & stone waterfall island bench
-Stainless steel appliances include electric cooktop, wall oven & dishwasher
-Zoned bedroom wing, comprising 3 BRs with BIRs (2 with SSACs)
-Main family bathroom with plantation shutters, spa bath & shower, plus sep. toilet/powder room
-Laundry with ample room, cupboard space & outdoor access to utilities area
-Impressive Master suite with double doors, plantation shutters, ensuite, double vanity & spacious WIR
-2nd living room/formal lounge, with raised pavilion ceiling & high light windows
-Double door entry, with tiles throughout & plush carpets accordingly
-SSAC in main living area, and three bedrooms, & electric log fire in 2nd living
-Vehicles are easily accommodated within the DLUG, with aggregate driveway & side gate providing rear yard access
for golf cart storage
-Fenced yard areas, plus courtyards & outdoor spa with waterfall feature
-Situated within an established estate, amongst picturesque golf course outlook & a reserve across the street
-Well equipped for families with children of all ages, a secure investment property or an equally fabulous holiday retreat - easy lock up and go!
-Gateway to the Bellarine Peninsula, Barwon Heads village & your choice of beaches
The Owner Loves….
“We love the layout of this house; all the bedrooms are on the south, with living to the north. Our favourite spot to sit and read is the sunny north-west nook overlooking the golf course and our courtyards. At night we put the fire on in the formal lounge, and enjoy the pavilion-style room with high light windows.”

Description:
A Place To Raise Your Family In Beautiful Connewarre
The Feel
Combining the key attributes of character, location, space & entertainment, the central focus of this solid brick home is family living. Call this place home for generations to come, with 3 generous living spaces, sunny entertaining areas, a solar-heated pool, huge shedding & 4.1 (approx) acres of rural land to enjoy... all just minutes by car to Warralily shops & Breamlea surf beach.
The Facts
-Classic 4BR+study solid brick home on 4.1 picturesque acres
-Long driveway leads to home, set back from the road, with privacy of extensive planting
-Rural lifestyle opportunity in tightly held Connewarre, only 3km to Bancoora beach
-Listen to the dawn chorus of birdsong as the sun rises through the east boundary trees
-Salt-chlorinated, solar heated, self-cleaning pool with waterfall & bluestone paving
-Powered/plumbed rustic pool house with SSAC
-Living & entertaining zones face north with French doors to maximise the sunny aspects & relaxed way of life
-Formal lounge room with east & south windows adjoins the main entry
-Versatile 3rd living/teenagers retreat/games room opens onto huge lawn
-Carpeted bedrooms all have BIRs & enjoy south facing garden views
-Master bedroom with stunning bay window seating, new ensuite with marble vanity & toilet
-Big country kitchen is centred in the heart of the home, with huge pantry space, black granite benchtops, Baltic timber
doors & hand carved corbels
-Ilve double 900mm electric oven, 5 burner gas cooktop, dishwasher & double fridge cavity
-Spacious dining room with Coonara, overlooking the Crepe Myrtle tree in courtyard
-Dado wall hallway leads to separate BR wing with study & large laundry
-Family bathroom with claw foot bath, large shower, marble top vanity & tessellated tiles
-Double brick garage, with adjoining carport, plus huge main American barn shed with triple roller doors, solid concrete
flooring & mezzanine floor. Additional double garage or workshop & sundry shedding for machinery storage
-Mix of Eucalypts, Yellow & Red Gums, Sheoaks; plants that are mainly indigenous to the area
-Lush new garden beds border the red brick façade and pathways
-Rainwater harvested for storage & large dam
-Large paddocks with great shade that could be fenced for agistment or hobby farming.
-Established vegie gardens, fire pit & chook run/pig pen for a self-sufficient lifestyle
-Blackbutt timber floors, Roman blinds, leadlight windows & reclaimed timber doors throughout
-Seasonal comfort with split system heating/cooling as well as ceiling fans
-A few short minutes by car to Warralily shops, or Breamlea surf beach, & close to an exceptional recreational reserve
-15mins to Geelong & Torquay, 6mins to cafes in Barwon Heads
The Owner Loves.
This is a home, not just a house. Its a great place to raise a family; our kids have loved having so much space to ride, explore & have fun on our property, with our favourite times spent in the pool and hosting barbecues with friends. Its so peaceful and I love the dawn chorus of birdsong in the mornings.
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. It is derived from sources believed to be accurate and current as at the date of publication and as such Bellarine Property simply pass this information on. Use of such material is at your sole risk. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.
Insights: 145 Bluestone School Road, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Golf, Beach, Relax - Repeat!
Kick back on the deck and soak in the sunset - this could be you on a daily basis living in this light-filled, second level apartment at the 13th Beach Golf Course estate near Barwon Heads.
Located in the private and secure coastal development this property showcases two double bedrooms with built-robes, one with its own sea breeze balcony - an ideal spot for breakfast! Next to the bedrooms is a central bathroom complete with walk-in shower, vanity and toilet and a hidden European laundry and linen press.
With views over the 18th hole, the residence features a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dining area and spacious lounge room. Venture through the sliding doors to a north-westerly facing entertainers zone that doubles your living area.
Partially furnished and currently tenanted, this is an ideal beachside investment. Also appealing to first-home buyers or golf fanatics on the lookout for a low maintenance and fuss-free weekender. The unit features a single lock-up garage plus additional parking, ducted heating and stand-out high ceilings.
Only a short drive from the centre of town, 20 minutes to Geelong, walk to two golf courses and stunning beaches. One thing to do and that is snap it up in time for summertime fun!
Insights: 4/110-126 Tomara Drive, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2019 and 3 other 2 bedroom unit in Connewarre have recently been sold.

Description:
Rural Living Minutes for Coast Village Lifestyle
Well fenced property of 51.5 ha 127 acres approx. A great location close to 13th Beach Golf Course, Barwon Heads boutique shopping, cafes, restaurants, surf beach and Barwon River safe swimming beaches. Zoned Farming with three road frontage comprising one paddock currently sown to wheat. Recycled water is available for irrigation including 5 megalitre storage dam. There are four hydrants already in place for centre pivot irrigator. An old weatherboard cottage which has been used as a shearing shed. Numerous house sites STCA. Opposite Barwon Heads airport, less than 5 minutes to Barwon Heads and Surf Coast beaches, 15 minutes to Geelong and just over an hour to Melbourne.
Insights: 1392-1450 Barwon Heads Road, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Dream Block in Prestigious 13th Beach Estate
Located in the famous 13th Beach Golf Links Resort home to the Vic Open, this gated community offers privacy and integrity in peaceful and stunning natural surrounds. Build your new home nestled amongst high quality existing homes in the estates most sought after location. Backing onto the first tee of the Beach course the generous 840m2 (approx) is the perfect parcel of land to build your dream home This location is a gateway to the Bellarine Peninsula, Barwon Heads village and your choice of pristine turquoise beaches. Take advantage of the lifestyle this location and community has to offer; enjoy weekend trips to local wineries, gorge yourself on sumptuous local cuisine, or bike down the Bellarine Rail Trail. With Geelong and Melbourne within easy driving distance you can really have it all! Make the change and never look back. This block also comes with two golf share memberships.
Insights: 48 Fourth Loop, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Semi-Rural Lifestyle With Beach Benefits
The Feel:
Set across a private and peaceful 3.5 acres approx., this modern homestead is an ideal opportunity for those looking for a little more space for their family, or to just experience the joy of a semi-rural lifestyle!
A spacious family floorplan and wide alfresco cater to any event big or small, with the benefit of a central coastal location moments to fantastic schools, world-class surf beaches, and coastal towns.
The Facts:
-Architecturally designed and custom built home on 3.5 acres approx.
-OP living and dining with wood fire and access to entertaining pergola
-Big family kitchen with WIP, Westinghouse oven and ss dishwasher
-Separately zoned lounge with sliding doors and alfresco access
-Master BR with WIR and ensuite, 2 queen BRs ideal for growing kids
-Study zone and laundry with ext. access off the central hall
-Premium FR5 insulation throughout, SSAC and ceiling fans
-Converted shipping container studio with acoustic paneling + workshop
-Veggie patch with 2500L rainwater tank, Clearwater irrigation to gardens
-2x large horse paddocks with electrified fencing, stable and town water
-6 car garage with heightened roller doors for caravan or floats
-Moments to the surf at Breamlea or 13th Beach
-7’ drive to Barwon Heads, 6’ to Warralily SC and 90mins to Melbourne
The Owner Loves….
“We have enjoyed the space and the privacy, entertaining has been a breeze with the big separate living zone for the kids. The house has been designed to capture warmth in winter, and stay cool in summer- so this keeps running costs down.”

Description:
Rural Coastal Retreat With Modern Twist
Recently refurbished, this classic solid brick homestead presents a combination of class, character, entertainment and location with family living kept front-of-mind. The copious amount of living area provides space to grow. The resort style pool and deck area will blow you away, giving you the perfect entertaining space for every celebration and occasion. Located just minutes from the new Warralily shopping centre, the Peninsula’s famous beaches and directly across from an exceptional recreational reserve, the 2 (approx) acres of pure rural bliss will bring happiness for generations to come.
- Sprawling solid brick home recently fully refurbished.
- The brick façade is bordered by lush new garden beds, path and a modern grey trim.
- Inviting entrance with feature timber hanging hooks and bauble pendant light fittings.
- Stylish, low maintenance and durable concrete tiles pave the way throughout the home.
- Seasonal comfort with ducted heating/cooling as well as ceiling fans.
- Light and stylish open plan living/dining/kitchen area is centred in the heart of the home.
- Additional offset living space offers endless possibilities.
- Quality, durable, modern carpets contrast well with the neutral colour scheme.
- Central living area opens to the deck through striking black sliding doors and features bespoke shelving.
- The plentiful dining area sits perfectly within one of many bay windows - posing an intimate feel for dinner time conversation.
- Cook in style in the modern kitchen with feature tiles, caesarstone bench tops and soft closing cabinetry.
- Feature overhead cabinetry contrasts with the aesthetic hardwood handles, durable timeless white lower cabinetry and custom display hardwood display shelving.
- Kitchen appliances include; 900mm Westinghouse freestanding oven including five burner gas cooktop and Fisher & Paykel double dish drawers.
- Walk in butlers pantry with ample storage and shelving, large fridge nook and sensor light.
- Additional offset tiled room is well appointed, allowing for unlimited options - from home study to personal fitness space.
- Grand master wing allows peace and privacy in comfort and style.
- Double doors open to the spacious master bedroom with bay window, hanging bedside pendant lights and bespoke timber floating shelves.
- Spacious walk-in robe has been fitted out with ample cabinetry including soft close drawers and extra tall hanging rails.
- Other features include solid timber doors throughout the home.
- Large luxury ensuite with modern black tapware and fittings, underfloor heating, oversize shower, freestanding oval bath and custom made Australian hardwood floating cabinetry.
- Leading hallway features two bedrooms with built-in robes and an additional bedroom with feature bay window and walk-in robe.
- Main bathroom with ceiling height wall tiles, quality black tapware and fittings, open shower, built in bath, feature mirror and floating custom made timber cabinetry.
- Large lounge/rumpus room with custom made floating timber wall unit and views out to the pool.
- Custom made quality blinds are fitted throughout the home including block-out’s in all bedrooms which tick both style and comfort boxes.
- Large laundry with full length benches, built in appliances nooks (take an s off), overhead shelving and extra tall storage cupboards.
- Double garage with internal access and plumbed for an additional laundry.
- Huge fully equipped detached 6 car garage/shed with solid concrete flooring, shelving and work benches.
- Established 30 metre gum trees throughout the property add to the native, tranquil ambiance.
- Multiple water tanks allow for year round lush gardens.
- Outside comprises of a huge undercover timber decking area overlooking the fully established tropical pool area and sprawling fully fenced back yard.
- Fully fenced, solar heated, in-ground pool area complete with slide is immaculately presented, surrounded by established, low maintenance tropical gardens and additional lush grassed area.
- Keep the kids and pets safe with the secure brush fencing separating the front and rear yards.
- Tranquil views over neighbouring paddocks and farm animals from the deck.
- Fully lined, rustic vegetable boxes allow for self-sufficiency and have recently been prepped for fresh planting.
- There is nothing not to love about this fresh, fun and rural home!

Description:
Coastal Rural Living Subdivision Opportunity
Investors and owner occupiers take a look at this one. 2.6 ha 6.4 acres ripe for two or possibly three lot subdivision STCA. Live in the existing house while you build a new home at the back or renovate and live in the current house and sell a block at the back.
Three bedroom home in need of renovation is structurally sound. Kitchen family room with slow combustion wood heater, separate meals and lounge. Detached 4 car steel garage with skillion extension ideal for firewood and other storage. 12m x 7.5m hayshed. Town water is connected.
Located Across the road from substantial recreation reserve, just a few minutes from the new Warralily shopping centre, 10 minutes to Barwon Heads, Torquay and iconic Surf Coast beaches.

Description:
Exceptional Living, Exceptional Views
The Feel:
This remarkable home offers space, a resort-style lifestyle, with an award winning golf course right at your back door.
Elegantly designed for family comfort this true entertainer offers seamless flow between indoors and out, where luxurious pool and fairway views form a stunning backdrop to everyday life.
The Facts:
-Stunning 50sq home overlooking the 5th hole of the award winning Creek Course
-885m2 approx. allotment set within a mix of colourful coastal, and native gardens
-Grand open plan living with large dining zone perfect for big family celebrations
-Bi-fold doors open to an expansive entertaining deck for BBQs with a view
-Solar heated in-ground pool surrounded by low maintenance paving and astroturf
-Large lawn space for backyard cricket, gated side area for pets or kids with sandpit
-Kitchen with plenty of drawers and prep space, SMEG apps and butlers pantry
-On the ground level 2 minor BRs with sizeable rumpus and guest BR
-Upstairs, 3 further BRs share a spacious retreat and scenic balcony
-Master enjoys stunning views of the 5th and 6th holes, with WIR and ensuite
-Polished concrete to ground floor, with square set cornices throughout
-Split-system heating and cooling, powerful gas log fire and double glazing
-Northerly aspect warms in winter with louvre windows assisting with ventilation
-4 car garage with rear roller door for golf cart access straight onto the course!
-Storage-laden laundry, heated outdoor shower, rainwater tanks for gardens
-Walk to all resort facilities inc. 2 championship courses, Clubhouse and 13th Beach
-5mins to Barwon Heads cafes and shops, with Warralily and Geelong all close by
-Minutes to wineries, coastal towns, surf and river beaches of the Bellarine Peninsula
The Owner Loves....
We just love the view out to the course, and looking out to the beautiful Oak Tree that is perfectly framed in the window every time you walk down the stairs. Combined with the pool, the luxury of space and this quiet coastal location - it really does feel like a resort.

Description:
Where Luxury Meets Lifestyle
The Feel:
Custom designed by local architects ‘Freehand Projects’, this contemporary builder’s own home centres around a sunny central courtyard, delivering an abundance of light to everyday living zones.
A fresh neutral palette incorporates natural timbers, polished concrete flooring and minimal interiors balancing perfectly with the surrounding coastal landscape and golf course greenery.
The Facts:
-Contemporary 3BR builder’s own home in prestigious 13th Beach Estate
-Backing onto the 5th hole of the Creek Course on 836sqm approx.
-Coastal landscaping, bagged brickwork and silvertop ash cladding facade
-Family-friendly floorplan with vast OP living and central courtyard
-Designer kitchen with matte black tiling, WIP and premium 90cm SMEG apps
-Two-way fireplace and custom joinery to expansive living and dining zone
-Master with luxe ensuite features a walk in shower, WIR and premium storage
-Minor BRs with BIRs, open ‘wet area’ bathroom with freestanding bath
-Separately zoned retreat, ideal as a children’s retreat , study or 4th BR
-Heightened square set ceilings, 100% wool carpet and polished concrete
-Double glazed architectural and louvre windows, hydronic heating and SSAC
-DLUG with int. access, side gated access to service area and laundry
-3.6kW solar array, 2000L rainwater tank to support gardens and lawns
-Walk to Clubhouse, with direct access to world-class surf at 13th Beach
-Minutes to Barwon Heads Village and schools, and only 90mins from Melbourne
The Owner Loves…
“The courtyard aspect just makes the entire home feel so open and light. Having the resort amenities and the surf at 13th Beach within a short walk or bike ride away has been fantastic.”

Description:
Golf, Beach, Entertain
Overlooking the lush green fairways of the prestigious 13th Beach Golf Course is this truly outstanding property and with a nearby established walking track that lands you on the sand within minutes - you've got the best of both worlds!
Masterfully-built with ceilings up to four metres that enhance the grand feel of the central living room. The dining room and formal lounge hold prime position with an outlook to nature that beckons you to question whether you have any neighbours or possibly not.
The high-end kitchen boasts Caesarstone benchtops, Smeg appliances, multiple dishwashers, soft close drawers, generous butler's pantry and an island breakfast bar that will become the main eatery space. Chefs will be well equipped for entertaining outside too with a gas line connection which prevents last minute trips for bottles.
Be treated to a glorious sunset most evenings from the oversized window in the master bedroom. Also on the ground floor is a double bedroom with a WIR, en suite and private patio, as well as a laundry complete with a drying cupboard and wine storage.
Upstairs is a third double bedroom with BIRs, separate bathroom and WC, multi-purpose room with a balcony and kitchenette. Perfect for accommodating older children or ageing relatives.
Golf enthusiasts will be thrilled with the additional driveway and golf cart store room accessed via an automated roller door and behind a double LUG. The list of features continues!
- Seamless integration with an al fresco, undercover area
- Double-glazed windows and ducted vacuum cleaner
- Hydronic heating and multiple reverse cycle systems
- Kocom intercom system downstairs and upstairs
- Two 3,000 water tanks servicing toilets and irrigating the garden
- CCTV security system with four channels
- Tranquil lifestyle in a gated community
- Minutes from buzzing Barwon Heads and less than 20 minutes to Geelong
Insights: 57 Fourteenth Road, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2019 and 4 other 3 bedroom house in Connewarre have recently been sold.

Description:
Lifestyle Property At Lake Connewarre
Many who choose lifestyle properties may feel daunted by the amount of work required to bring their own ‘rural dream' to life. Set over 6.8 Acres this unique property has seen a lot of the hard work already done, creating a solid base for a comfortable rural lifestyle to see your family thrive.
-Rare opportunity to secure 6.8 Acres (approx.) with expansive 4BR home and separate cottage
-Quietly positioned in a no through road minutes to Breamlea Surf Beach, and Barwon Heads
-Open living and entertaining is graced with a northerly aspect, with views out to Lake Connewarre
-Set well back from the road, with entry via a long driveway lined with established olive trees
-Country kitchen with enormous pantry boasting loads of storage for small appliances and food
-A central stone island is a gathering place for families, while mum and dad cook up a storm!
-Feel like you're at the movies in the zoned theatre room with hard-wired surround sound speakers
-Winter will be cosy in this home with a wood fire, assisted by extensive insulation and double brick
-In summer the evaporative cooling and ceiling fans ensure every room in the home is comfortable
-Easy care tiling, floating timber flooring and neutral carpets cater well to a rural family lifestyle
-Master with study, His/Hers WIR, and spacious ensuite with corner spa and in situ shower
-Wing with 2 large bedrooms both with BIRs share a bathroom and laundry sized for families
-Upstairs, a bedroom and powder room, and retreat with sink and fridge will keep teens amused!
-Step out onto a spacious balcony, enjoying a rural landscape with surprising lake views
-Ducted vacuum, fantastic storage and excellent parking caters well to growing families
-Large rear yard for young children and fantastic ‘Tuscan' fire pit area for night time entertaining
-Try your hand at hobby farming on this established property, with all the setup work done
-New boundary fencing, with secure paddocks for horses including a tack room and shelter
-Cook with produce from your own fully fenced vegie patch, watered by a 22,500L water tank
-Fully functional shearing shed with sorting alley and gates right next to a rear paddock for sheep
-Manzanillo, Frantoio and Kalamata olive trees, providing on average 60-70L of extra virgin olive oil a year
-Machinery shed with large tractor bay, rustic ‘studio' with power, and general storage sheds
-Self-contained two room studio with own entry, a potential for B&B or guest retreat
-Enjoy the peace and privacy surrounded by green farming belts that will never be built on
-Endless lifestyle benefits on offer, with beaches, wineries and coastal towns all a short drive away
-7mins to Barwon Heads Cafes and River beaches, 4mins to Breamlea surf beach, 20mins to Geelong
If you're looking for a property with room to grow and forever views, then look no further than this rare lifestyle opportunity moments to the coast, and town. Be sure to bring the kids along!

Description:
A Prestigious Nature Lovers Retreat
Private native gardens and manicured lush lawns besiege this premier 13th Beach property, harnessing an enviable natural energy across a peaceful 2900m2 (approx) allotment. A privilege of open space complements the luxurious custom built 3BR home, set up for all season enjoyment in a most opulent manner.
-A sense of grandeur is felt upon approach, tucked into the end of a quiet drive, shrouded by native vegetation
-Soaring ceilings, highlight glazing and seamless outdoor flow create the footwork for a light filled living zone
-Perfectly orientated to take advantage of pleasing sunny aspects to the north and ambient course outlooks on the south
-Both sides of this well designed family home open up to take advantage of cross ventilation and seasonal changes
-The grand master suite enjoys beautiful garden outlooks, a WIR with automated lighting and ensuite bathroom
-Entertainers will delight in the contemporary kitchen, boasting stone benchtops, Smeg appliances and walk in pantry
-Two further bedrooms flank the second living area to the rear and glorious main bathroom with freestanding bath
-Bespoke joinery is a complementary touch throughout, continued within the study and huge linen walk in linen/storeroom
-A well-equipped workshop space offers flexibility as an artists studio, 4th bedroom or additional living space
-Underfloor hydronic heating, a commodious gas log fire and air-conditioning are on hand should the need arise
-An established veggie patch, rainwater tanks and professionally landscaped gardens are a green thumbs delight
-The DLUG enjoys direct internal access, with extra OSP available for trailers or additional small equipment
-Approximately 6 minutes in the car to the Barwon Heads village, or 25 minutes to the Geelong CBD
-An obvious choice for golf enthusiasts, with all the facilities of the award winning 13th Beach Golf Links at hand
A most covetable location where the sounds of the sea and distant dune outlooks, contrast against organic farmland views to the western boundary of Barwon Heads. This property is living proof that you really can have it all!
Insights: 42 Second Drive, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2018 and 4 other 3 bedroom house in Connewarre have recently been sold.
